attributes.action: Make it against the law to hit a cat and drive off, as it is for dogs
attributes.background: My beautiful boy was hit by car, the driver didn't stop. Two ladies witnessed it and called me. Luckily he didn't suffer, he died instantly. Most people live unaware that their cat has been killed! It's illegal to hit a dog and drive off but not a cat? Are cats not just as important? It's wrong!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104735

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
